'''Bodo Proudfoot''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Bodo married [[Linda Proudfoot|Linda Baggins]]. They had one son, [[Odo Proudfoot|Odo]].<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>
